definition: husk/(of a radish etc) spongy (and therefore unappetising)

sentences.english: There is a bright future of millet bran oil industry in China.
sentences.chinese: 我國大力發展穀糠油產業前景廣闊。

sentences.english: Like chaff from a threshing floor.
sentences.chinese: 象打穀場上飛迸的穀糠。

sentences.english: They usually feed a moist mash to fowls.
sentences.chinese: 他們通常用穀糠煮成的溼飼料餵養家禽。
